CustomField.formula: IF (RecordType.Name = 'Triage Nurse Peer Review', NTSP_Case__r.CreatedBy.FirstName + " " + NTSP_Case__r.CreatedBy.LastName, NTSP_Case__r.Telestroke_Consultant__r.FirstName + " " + NTSP_Case__r.Telestroke_Consultant__r.LastName)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is auto populated upon save.
CustomField.label: Reviewee
